item.title: About
item.description: I’m Andrea I am currently a MRes student at the University of Edinburgh. Previously, I pursued a BSc in Computer Science at the University of Southampton. During my degree I worked as a Google SWE Intern first in Munich, Germany then Mountain View, CA. My interests are directed toward Machine Learning and then evolved into Reinforcement Learning and Computational Cognitive Neuroscience and Psychiatry, the focus of my current reasearch.
